testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API for specific mentioned Date
testcase.name: Verify if Current Date Exchange rate response is received while triggering request for any future date
testcase.system-out: Given Currency-exchange rate API is up and running..........................passed When I hit the API URL for the mentioned future date exchange rate "/2021-03-25".passed Then API returns the success response with status code as 200...............passed And The response with Current date is received..............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API
testcase.name: Verify if 400 BAD VALUE ERROR response is received for incorrect URL for Exchange rates request
testcase.system-out: Given Exchange rate API is up and running...................................passed When I hit the API URL with endpoint as "/351latest"........................passed Then API Error Code 400 should be displayed.................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API
testcase.name: Verify the success Status is received while hitting for Exchange Rate request
testcase.system-out: Given Currency Exchange rate API is up and running..........................passed When I hit the API URL for the latest currency exchange rates with endpoint as "/latest".passed Then API returns the response with status code as 200.......................passed

testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API
testcase.name: Verify the Response is generated for Latest Exchange rates request
testcase.system-out: Given Currency Exchange rate API is up and running..........................passed When I hit the API URL for the latest currency exchange rates with endpoint as "/latest".passed Then API returns the response with status code as 200.......................passed And Response is getting pulled with all the exchange rate data for different currencies.passed

testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API for specific mentioned Date
testcase.name: Verify if Success Status Code is generated while triggering GET Request for specific date
testcase.system-out: Given Currency-Exchange rate API is up and running..........................passed When I hit the API URL for the specific date exchange rate with endpoint as "/2021-03-17".passed Then API return the response with status code as 200........................passed

testcase.classname: Verify different features of Exchange Rates API for specific mentioned Date
testcase.name: Verify the Response is received while hitting Exchange rate Request with specific Date
testcase.system-out: Given Currency-Exchange rate API is up and running..........................passed When I hit the API URL for the specific date exchange rate with endpoint as "/2021-03-17".passed Then API return the response with status code as 200........................passed And Response is getting pulled for the specific date........................passed
